name: Giblin
features: **Giblin Ancestry.** The giblin has advantage on saving throws against fear.
actions: **Shortsword.** Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (ld6 + 2) piercing damage.

name: HibGiblin
features: **Giblin Ancestry.** The giblin has advantage on saving throws against fear.
actions: **Battle Axe.** Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld8 + 2) slashing damage.

name: Giblin Berserk
features: **Giblin Ancestry.** The giblin has advantage on saving throws against fear.
**Rickliss.** At the start of its turn, the berserk can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.
actions: **Glaive.** Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (ld10 + 2) slashing damage.
